name: Relocation (deskilln)
description:
This was made for the 'STOP WAITING FOR GODOT' Game Jam.

A platformer with a teleportation mechanic because why not.

  • Movement: ad or arrow keys
  • Jumping: w, up arrow, or shift
  • Teleportation (when you unlock it): x, l, q, e
If you are confused on how to beat the level with 4 spike platforms Teleporting on the ground doesn't consume your teleport

also the first game i've published anywhere (scratch doesn't count)
